More info: I have another 'unterminated' launch. Its 'javaw.exe' process is 
marked as <terminated>, but the VM is marked as suspended. It has several 
threads that are marked as <not responding>. I verified with the Windows Task 
Manager that the corresponding process is not running.

I cannot remove this launch (the Remove All Terminated Launches button is 
greyed out).

You should be able to use "terminate and remove" from the context menu when a 
VM gets into a "broken" state.
This menu item was disabled as well.
